title: Cratoni C-Safe adds crash sensor to any helmet; Madroc Pro smart convertible full face & more!
content:
Cratoni makes it easier to stay safer with separate new C-Safe crash sensor that can upgrade any helmet, even swap back and forth whatever & wherever you ride.
